The Covad Fragment is an old untranslated manuscript thought to be written in Dawnchant.
Deeli is a lighteyed woman on the Shattered Plains of Roshar.
Gaseous Investiture within the Rosharan system manifests as a number of different Lights.
Taffa was a woman who lived on Roshar during the Eighth Heraldic Epoch.
Elend Venture is a Mistborn. He is married to Vin.
Officer Gremt is a member of The Tower on the Dayside of Lord General Raagent.

Riika is a young Elantrian child.
Kurth, also known as the City of Lightning, is an island city in Rira on Roshar.
Koolf is a member of Bridge Four on Roshar.
Steel is one of the alloys used in the Metallic Arts.
Nlent is a squat Thaylen guard on Vstim's caravan.

Glurv is a deserter from the Alethi armies during the War of Reckoning.
